artist: Maker: Duro Mold and Manufacturing Inc.
description: silver space ship with globe (moon?) on top; aqua ring around globe; USA on sides of ship in red
inscription:
Inscriptions; Decal

on ring: [COMMEMORATING COMDR. ALAN B. SHEPHERD\'S FIRST FLIGHT FROM AMERICA INTO OUTER SPACE MAY 5, 1961 TIME 15 MIN. HT. 115 MI DIST. 300 MILES APPROX.]
inside base: [DURO MOLD AND MFG. INC./ DETROIT 34 MICH./ US PAT D54509/CANADAIAN PAT 25826/ OTHER COUNTRIES PEND.]
in rim of base: [MODEL 1000/ DESTINATION- MOON/ BANK/ NOTE KEEP SPRING GREASED]
markings: decal in black: [GREATER ARIZONA SAVINGS/ AND LOAN ASSOCI/ATION...]
title: "Destination Moon Bank" mechanical bank
